subject: FW: Eugene PD x Flock Safety - legal discussion
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hello Mark,

 

This is the meeting invite for our discussion with Flock Safety next Thursday. Forwarding to you. Myself, Nikki Choterungruangkorn (Contract Admin), and Capt. Jacob Burke (Project Manager) will be on the call on the EPD side of things.

 

Best,

 

Tim Costin

Sr. Financial Analyst

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

Office: (541) 682-8364

Cell: (541) 844-9015

 



 

-----Original Appointment-----
From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 1:27 PM
To: Caroline Fraher; COSTIN Timothy M; CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki; BURKE Jacob T; Mike Molina; Ashley Hickman
Subject: Eugene PD x Flock Safety - legal discussion
When: Thursday, March 13, 2025 2:00 PM-3:00 PM America/Los_Angeles.
Where: 

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Eugene PD x Flock Safety - legal discussion 

Hi all, We will use this time to discuss any outstanding redlines/comments on Flock's Master Services Agreement between both the City of Eugene and Flock's legal teams. Thank You, Caroline Fraher

  

 

This event has been updated

Changed: time
